original_title: India vs. Pakistan: Stars of India
overview: Relive this exciting matchup from the International Cricket Council's Cricket World Cup 2003, in which India is pitted against Pakistan in a do-or-die qualifying round. India faces an early and large deficit, but the talents of players such as Rahul Dravid, Virender Sehwag and batsman Sachin Tendulkar (in a Man of the Match performance) were equal to the task. This program also contains a bonus presentation that profiles Tendulkar.
title: India vs. Pakistan: Stars of India
